Class Summary
Constructor Attributes Constructor Name and Description
 
FnAttrClass(originalFn, fnName)
Internal class to build the attributes on the funciton

Class Detail

FnAttrClass(originalFn, fnName)
Internal class to build the attributes on the funciton
Parameters:
{Function} originalFn
the function on which the attributes are set
{String} fnName
optional name of the function - default to 'aFunction'

  • before(beforeFn)

    Trigger the debugger when the function is called
    Parameters:
    {Function} originalFn
    the original function
    {Function} conditionFn Optional

    {FnAttrClass} for chained API

    allowed types for the paramter. array with each item is the allowed types for this parameter.

    allowed types for the return value
